AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Child Unlock Form Add Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Allows user to unlock a child if locked by Blackbaud or by OCM.
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_CHILDUNLOCK ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @UNLOCKCHILD bit = 0 ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- we don't actually save any data here, we just call the sprocs to unlock the given child! If @UNLOCKCHILD = 1 begin -- go ahead and unlock child -- first unlock the blackbaud one exec dbo.USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_UNLOCK @ID = @CONTEXTID, -- sponsorship opportunity id value, which is the sponsorshipopportunitychild id value @SPONSORCOUNT = 0, -- 0 = No change (just unlock), 1 = Sponsorship created/activated (increment sponsor count) @CHANGEAGENTID = @CHANGEAGENTID
-- then unlock the OCM table: exec dbo.USR_DELETE_LOCK_CHILD_FOR_SPONSORSHIP_SELECTION @OPPORTUNITYID = @CONTEXTID end
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
